safe_passage.title: Safe Passage Reliability
safe_passage.description: Standard deviation of speeds on school routes during peak hours. Lower means more consistent service.

community_connection.title: 24-Hour Connection Rate
community_connection.description: Percentage of routes with consistent speeds (<5 MPH difference) between peak and all-day service.

petunia_index.title: The "Petunia" Index
petunia_index.description: Average speed of short-distance local circulator routes.
